api.title: Explore Ancient Greece
api.description: Discover the rich history and stunning architecture of ancient Greek ruins across Athens, Delphi, and more.

api.title: Island Hopping in the Caribbean
api.description: Experience the ultimate relaxation with crystal clear waters and vibrant nightlife in the Caribbean islands.

api.title: Adventure in the Rockies
api.description: Hike, ski, and explore the vast wilderness of the Rocky Mountains in this thrilling adventure tour.

api.title: Cultural Journey Through Japan
api.description: Immerse yourself in the traditions and modern wonders of Japan with visits to Tokyo, Kyoto, and Osaka.

api.title: Safari Adventure in Kenya
api.description: Encounter Africa’s wildlife up close on a thrilling safari through Kenya’s national parks and reserves.
